程序包 com.se.aiconomy.client.controller.signup.signupFlows

类 SignupFlowController1

java.lang.Object
com.se.aiconomy.client.controller.signup.signupFlows.SignupFlowController1
public class SignupFlowController1 extends Object
Controller for the first step of the signup flow. Handles user input for email and password, validation, and navigation to the next step.
